item.description:
Exemplar Law Partners invites you to attend The Boston Entrepreneur Meetup Group featuring InnerCity Entrepreneurs (ICE)
ICE is an award winning small business development program designed to help take small businesses to the next level.

Come network and learn more about this exciting new program!

Exemplar Law Partners invites you to attend The Boston Entrepreneur Meetup Group featuring InnerCity Entrepreneurs (ICE)


ICE is an award winning small business development program designed to help take small businesses to the next level.


ICE is a program for business owners who:

· Want dedicate time to develop a business strategy, become more profitable, and to scale

· Value a forum of peers and business experts to discuss operational issues

· Want to develop a strategic growth plan that they are consistently held accountable to act on and implement



ICE offers the following resources as part of it?s 9 month program:

· 14 classes (2 classes per month)

· 6 Peer to Peer Sessions

· 2 business seminars

· 2 professional networking events

· Access to a wide network of ICE entrepreneurs and business professionals

· 3 year strategic growth planning and implementation


Food and drink will be provided



Fred Follansbee

Boston Program Coordinator, Innercity Entrepreneurs

675 Massachusetts Avenue, 9th Floor

Cambridge, MA 02139
O: (617) 492-2304

F: (617) 492-2310

www.InnercityEntrepreneurs.org
item.name: Inner City Entrepreneurs Program - Networking & Introduction
